message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to counteroffer at $90 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to consider it. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $105 for the product. It's a fair price considering its value to you.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to counteroffer at $95 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $102.50.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $97.5 for the product.
I'm still not willing to go as low as $97.50, Bob. I'm willing to make one more offer. I'll give you the product for $105, but that's my final offer.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to counteroffer at $100 for the product.
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob. However, I still need to make a bit more profit. I'll meet you at $102, but that's my absolute limit.
I appreciate your effort, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to counteroffer at $98 for the product.
